name: Tavaris
description:
First-person survival horror that adds puzzle elements, set in an abandoned Soviet bunker used during the Cold War. With an oppressive atmosphere, it seeks to generate a sense of alertness and pressure characteristic of the genre's escape room.

The game is part of an university project created  by a group of 6 students during 10 weeks.
